resources.string: Face your device directly straight to the object and press ready. Get the front angle as close to 0° as possible.
Tilt your phone downwards. Point the dot at the ground and press take.
Tilt your phone frontwards/downwards. Point the dot at the bottom of the object and press take.
Tilt your phone frontwards/downwards. Point the dot at the top of the object and press take.
"Tilt your phone sideways. Point the dot on the left side of the object and press take.
Tilt your phone sideways. Point the dot on the right side of the object and press take.
Press use to show the measurements or reset to retake.
Measurement screenshot generated by the Volume Calculator
